name: Kurikurinku @Ignister
effectText: If this card is in your hand or GY (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "@Ignister" monster; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. When a card or effect is activated that targets a Cyberse monster(s) you control, and you control a Cyberse monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; negate that effect. You can only use each effect of "Kurikurinku @Ignister" once per turn.
